org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker

Class CopyComponentTokenTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker.BasicComponentTokenTracker
      • org.jetel.graph.runtime.tracker.CopyComponentTokenTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentTokenTracker

    public class CopyComponentTokenTracker
extends BasicComponentTokenTracker
    Token tracker for components which create N out-tokens for one read token, where 1st of the N out-tokens is considered to be the single read token. IDs of out-tokens are watched and if currently written token has equal ID as the last token, then these out-tokens are linked. Otherwise no action is made; first written token from group of out-tokens with equal IDs is considered to have passed through the component (no freeing, no unification of tokens). This handles situation when read order and write order of related tokens differs, like in sorting components. Suitable for SimpleCopy-like components, e.g. Ext/FastSort.
